option.od: print the help message and exit.
input image filename. If this is omitted the image will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Convert an extended Portable PixMap (PPMX) image to a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image.

description.p: Convert an extended Portable PixMap (PPMX) image to a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image.
The PNG image is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert PPMX file inp.ppmx to the PNG file out.png.
